title: The Travelling Auctioneers
overview: The Travelling Auctioneers sees Christina, JJ, Robin and Izzie split off into pairs and take their travelling auction house and workshop out on the road across the UK. Along the way, they'll unearth hidden gems and turn unwanted items into winning lots.Sifting through one family home at a time, the team will first need to identify the items with the biggest selling appeal. Christina and Izzie will then call on their auctioneer contacts and expertise, whilst JJ and Robin use their incredible craft and restoration skills to bring new life to neglected treasures â€“ ready for a thrilling on-site auction at the end of each episode.
